MovieScript: After a mysterious temporal anomaly disrupts reality, Deadpool finds himself unexpectedly entangled with Paradox, a rogue time traveler manipulating history for his own gain.  As Deadpool attempts to fix the chaos in his usual reckless manner, Emma, a brilliant strategist with a hidden past, joins the mission, offering both intellect and combat skills.  Meanwhile, Wolverine, drawn into the conflict by his own fractured memories of a past altered by Paradox, reluctantly teams up with Deadpool despite their long-standing differences.
